forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning will become intermittent for the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers this morning changing to all rain this afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then some snow showers after midnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Overcast in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers of rain and wet snow in the morning. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain in the evening will transition to a mixture of rain and snow late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early will give way to a mixture of snow and rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High near 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening light rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain...mixing with snow late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.
